pages.text: The power of the melon lock seed The melon lock seed in the right-click linkage item has a chance to trigger a Helheim dimension crack that spawns around 4 squares near the player, the player can right-click to enter that dimension, or come out, but I don't know why most of the cracks are one-way tickets, so please don't leave your lock seed behind, in case you can't go home! By the way, you can only summon 5 portals each time, otherwise it will blow up the player's 3 points of blood, which is also the reason for the uncontrollable force~
